analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#485-498):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#495-498)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#498)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#320-402):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#331-337)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#340-343)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#375)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#373-374)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#320-402):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#331-337)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#340-343)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#376-379)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#378-379)

CrowdsaleExt.investInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- crowdsale.updateEarlyParicipantWhitelist(msg.sender,this,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#397-399)

CrowdsaleExt.setEndsAt has external calls inside a loop:
	- time > crowdsale.startsAt() (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#621)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#276-310):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#289-291)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#320-402):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#331-337)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#340-343)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#413-429):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#415-416)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#422-423)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#423-425)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#422)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#420-422)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#689-713) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#700-713)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#702-713)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#194-195)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x28923892cce4382efd5ba9e3effd1be6d5b87bf5.sol#8-9)
